thread.title: BRIEF-Full House Resorts Announces Registered Direct Offering

title: BRIEF-Full House Resorts Announces Registered Direct Offering
text: March 22, 2018 / 8:43 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Full House Resorts Announces Registered Direct Offering Reuters Staff March 22 (Reuters) - Full House Resorts Inc: * FULL HOUSE RESORTS ANNOUNCES REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING * FULL HOUSE RESORTS INC - ANNOUNCED REGISTERED DIRECT OFFERING OF UP TO 4.2 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK FOR GROSS PROCEEDS OF UP TO $12.5 MILLION * FULL HOUSE RESORTS - INTENDS TO USE PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING FOR PHASE ONE OF EXPANSION OF BRONCO BILLYâ€™S CASINO AND HOTEL, IN COLARADO AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
